transcripts.text: I'm Pete Buttigieg, and I approve this message.
Pete's approach is refreshing to me because he's thoughtful.  It shows he's listening, he's paying attention.
Medicare for all that wants it is very important.  We have to have people have the choice to keep their private health insurance or to go on the Medicare plan.
Pete's plan for Medicare for all who want it gives people that choice.
He seems sensible, not going to promise something that he cannot deliver.
He is interested in unifying people, and the country needs that.
